name: Heel Turn-Ado
description:
Weatherman Herf Gerfman and his trusty pet tornado Nadine go on a war path to enact revenge on the townsfolk for heckling Herf about his inaccurate weather predictions.

WASD to drive

Right Click to return to menu

Everything built from barebones OpenGL and OpenAL implementations, with few helper libraries (GLM, stb_image).  Main tech intrigue for me was the implementation of Wave Function Collapse to generate random maps from a set of tiles.  Also my first game jam and first game.  I learned a lot about managing game states and entities efficiently, mostly by doing these things quite terribly and seeing the ramifications.

Thanks for checking it out, let me know if you can't get it to run and I'll try to fix what I can!
